{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11ac Dual Band WiFi Mini PCIe Module |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asiarf.com/Mediatek-MT7612E-802-11ac-a-b-g-n-WiFi-Mini-PCIe-Module-2-4---5GHz-dual-bands-WS2433-product-view-396.html |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = AsiaRF_WS2433 |wikipedia = |brand = AsiaRF |model = WS2433 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/22/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AsiaRF_WS2433 |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Features=== *Compatible with wireless 802.11abgn/ac standard :with data rates up to 867Mbps *Supports 802.11i security standard and implements :hardware acceleration for TKIP, CCMP and WAPI. *The device also supports 802.11e QoS for video, :voice, and multimedia applications. *Built with proprietary power MMIC's. *2.4GHz for reliable and demanding all IoT, POS, :and Industrial PC applications *Supports WMM, WMM-PS (802.11e QoS standard) *Supports 64/128-bit WEP, WPA (TKIP with 802.1x), :WPA2 (AES with 802.1x) for high security level *Operating system supports for: Windows 2000/XP/Vista, :Windows 7/8/10, MAC 10.4.x and above & Linux, Android ===Specifications=== 
*Standards: USB 2.0 standard
Wireless: 802.11abgn/ac (2T2R)

*Data Rate:
:802.11ac 1733Mbps TX/RX
:802.11a/n 600Mbps TX/RX
:802.11a/g 108Mbps TX/RX
:802.11b 22Mbps TX/RX

*Output Power:
11a: 16dBm ± 1.5dbm 54Mbps
11b: 20dbm ± 1.5dbm 11Mbps
11g: 18dbm ± 1.5dbm 54Mbps
11g/n: 18dBm ± 1.5dbm (MCS7,HT20), 17dBm (MCS7,HT40)
11a/n: 15dBm ± 1.5dbm (MCS7,HT20), 13dBm (MCS7,HT40)
11ac HT20: 12dBm ± 1.5dBm MCS8
11ac HT40: 12dBm ± 1.5dBm MCS9
11ac HT80: 12dBm ± 1.5dBm MCS9

*Receiver Sensitivity:
11a: -75Bm 54Mbps
11b: -89dBm 11Mbps
11g: -76dBm 54Mbps
11g/n: -74dBm (HT20,MCS7), -66dBm (HT40,MCS7)
11a/n: -73dBm (HT20,MCS7), -71dBm (HT40,MCS7)
11ac: -57dBm ± 2dBm (HT20,MCS8)
11ac: -54dBm ± 2dBm (HT40,MCS9)
11ac: -51dBm ± 2dBm (HT80,MCS9)

*Antenna: Internal Chip Antenna /
:External Antenna connector (IPEX)

*Frequency Range: 5.15~5.875GHz
US, Canada: 2.412~2.462GHz (CH1~CH11)
EU, Japan: 2.412~2.472GHz (CH1~CH13)

*Software:  	
Security: 64/128-bit WEP Encryption, WPA, WPA2
Driver: Windows XP/2000/Vista, Windows7/8/10, Linux, Mac
*Operating Voltage: DC 5V ± 5%
[[Category:English Documentation]]
